duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct market research and analysis to inform business strategy and decision-making.
Utilize data analysis and financial modeling to support strategic planning and forecasting.
Collaborate with key team leaders to execute strategic plans and identify improvement opportunities.
Contribute to new market forecasting analyses and develop detailed geographic and population-driven analyses.
Review and refine financial models based on local market dynamics to support revenue projections.
Contribute to operational planning and care model development based on business needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Economics, or related field (Master's preferred)
